description:
Raspberry Pi Imager is the quick and easy way to install Raspberry Pi OS and other operating systems to a microSD card, ready to use with your Raspberry Pi.

Raspberry Pi Imager is the quick and easy way to install Raspberry Pi OS and other operating systems to a microSD card, ready to use with your Raspberry Pi.

Download and install Raspberry Pi Imager on a computer with an SD card reader. Insert the microSD card you’ll use with your Raspberry Pi into the reader and run Raspberry Pi Imager.
What's Changed
- Update de translations by @rejas in https://github.com/raspberrypi/rpi-imager/pull/1468
- refactor(ImButton): Update implicit width calculation for better cont… by @tdewey-rpi in https://github.com/raspberrypi/rpi-imager/pull/1473
Full Changelog: https://github.com/raspberrypi/rpi-imager/compare/v2.0.5...v2.0.6
